actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Potomac River National Historical Park in the Commonwealth of Virginia.
short_title: Potomac River National Historical Park Act

summary.text: Potomac River National Historical Park Act - Provides for the establishment of the Potomac River National Historical Park in the Commonwealth of Virginia. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: Potomac River National Historical Park Act
A bill to establish the Potomac River National Historical Park in the Commonwealth of Virginia.
